Printing:Color/Grayscale? Property

Short Name: Pr.Color/Grayscale?

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Application Properties

To Use: Create a property.

If TRUE, LabVIEW sends color/grayscale output to the printer. If FALSE, LabVIEW sends monochrome output to the printer.

Note  (macOS) LabVIEW supports only grayscale printing. You cannot use this property to change printing settings on macOS.

This property is similar to the Color/Grayscale printing checkbox on the Printing page of the Options dialog box.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Remote access allowedYes
